description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the KUKA KR 60 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for KUKA KR 60 manipulators. This currently includes the KR 60 HA only.
Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the specifications. All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
